attributes.action: Reward Ann Widdecombe in the next Honours List
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that Ann Widdecombe deserves to be rewarded with a title, probably Baroness, in the next Honours List.  She is not only popular, she's also highly valuable as a polititician and would be a great asset to the House of Lords.

Let us see Ann Widdecombe become Baroness Ann Widdecombe.
